scc_goals.description: Check whether Event Streams has at least # users with the IAM manager role no_of_managers_for_mongo_db = 3
Check whether Event Streams has at least # service IDs with the IAM manager role no_of_service_id_managers_for_mongo_db = 3
Check whether Event Streams is accessible only by using private endpoints Found in: resource_address: module.event_streams.ibm_resource_instance.es_instance
Check whether Cloud Internet Services (CIS) has DDoS protection enabled
Check whether account has at least one VPN or Direct Link configured
